trans-unit.source: A semantic zoom control allows the user to zoom between two different semantic views of the same data set.
trans-unit.target: A semantic zoom control allows the user to zoom between two different semantic views of the same data set.

trans-unit.source: Semantic zoom
trans-unit.target: Semantic zoom

trans-unit.source: Semantic zoom
trans-unit.target: Semantic zoom

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: The semantic zoom control enables the user to zoom between two different views of the same content so that they can quickly navigate through a large data set.
trans-unit.target: The semantic zoom control enables the user to zoom between two different views of the same content so that they can quickly navigate through a large data set.

trans-unit.source: The zoomed-in view is the main view of the content.
trans-unit.target: The zoomed-in view is the main view of the content.

trans-unit.source: You show the complete data set in this view.
trans-unit.target: You show the complete data set in this view.

trans-unit.source: The zoomed-out view is a higher-level view of the same content.
trans-unit.target: The zoomed-out view is a higher-level view of the same content.

trans-unit.source: You typically show the group headers for a grouped data set in this view.
trans-unit.target: You typically show the group headers for a grouped data set in this view.

trans-unit.source: For example, when viewing an address book, the user could zoom in on a letter and see the names associated with that letter.
trans-unit.target: For example, when viewing an address book, the user could zoom in on a letter and see the names associated with that letter.

trans-unit.source: Important APIs
trans-unit.target: Important APIs

trans-unit.source: SemanticZoom class
trans-unit.target: SemanticZoom class

trans-unit.source: **Features**:
trans-unit.target: **Features**:

trans-unit.source: The size of the zoomed-out view is constrained by the bounds of the semantic zoom control.
trans-unit.target: The size of the zoomed-out view is constrained by the bounds of the semantic zoom control.

trans-unit.source: Tapping on a group header toggles views.
trans-unit.target: Tapping on a group header toggles views.

trans-unit.source: Pinching as a way to toggle between views can be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Pinching as a way to toggle between views can be enabled.

trans-unit.source: Active headers switch between views.
trans-unit.target: Active headers switch between views.

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: A semantic zoom used in the Photos app.
trans-unit.target: A semantic zoom used in the Photos app.

trans-unit.source: A semantic zoom used in the Photos app
trans-unit.target: A semantic zoom used in the Photos app

trans-unit.source: An address book is one example of a data set that can be much easier to navigate using a semantic zoom control.
trans-unit.target: An address book is one example of a data set that can be much easier to navigate using a semantic zoom control.

trans-unit.source: In one view is the complete, alphanumerical overview of people in the address book (left image), while the zoomed-in view displays the data in order and with greater detail (right image).
trans-unit.target: In one view is the complete, alphanumerical overview of people in the address book (left image), while the zoomed-in view displays the data in order and with greater detail (right image).

trans-unit.source: example of semantic zoom used in a contacts list
trans-unit.target: example of semantic zoom used in a contacts list

trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: When using semantic zoom in your app, be sure that the item layout and panning direction don't change based on the zoom level.
trans-unit.target: When using semantic zoom in your app, be sure that the item layout and panning direction don't change based on the zoom level.

trans-unit.source: Layouts and panning interactions should be consistent and predictable across zoom levels.
trans-unit.target: Layouts and panning interactions should be consistent and predictable across zoom levels.

trans-unit.source: Semantic zoom enables the user to jump quickly to content, so limit the number of pages/screens to three in the zoomed-out mode.
trans-unit.target: Semantic zoom enables the user to jump quickly to content, so limit the number of pages/screens to three in the zoomed-out mode.

trans-unit.source: Too much panning diminishes the practicality of semantic zoom.
trans-unit.target: Too much panning diminishes the practicality of semantic zoom.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using semantic zoom to change the scope of the content.
trans-unit.target: Avoid using semantic zoom to change the scope of the content.

trans-unit.source: For example, a photo album shouldn't switch to a folder view in File Explorer.
trans-unit.target: For example, a photo album shouldn't switch to a folder view in File Explorer.

trans-unit.source: Use a structure and semantics that are essential to the view.
trans-unit.target: Use a structure and semantics that are essential to the view.

trans-unit.source: Use group names for items in a grouped collection.
trans-unit.target: Use group names for items in a grouped collection.

trans-unit.source: Use sort ordering for a collection that is ungrouped but sorted, such as chronological for dates or alphabetical for a list of names.
trans-unit.target: Use sort ordering for a collection that is ungrouped but sorted, such as chronological for dates or alphabetical for a list of names.

trans-unit.source: This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: This article contains information that is specific to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.

trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.1 guidance, please download the [Windows 8.1 guidelines PDF](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=258743).
